conclusion: Analyze the flow of liquid through channels to determine which container it will flow into.
Baffles are labeled A, B, C, and D.
Liquid will flow from point A to point B, then to point C, and finally to point D.
After passing through the baffles, the liquid will flow into container E.
Liquid flows from A through channels to B, then to C, and finally to D, and into container E.
